column4: i receive a message when i suspend: 'vlc has stopped hibernate from taking place playing some media' any clue?
yes, press stop in VLC before you suspend
oh right... were you using it earlier? perhaps try opening VLC and then closing it again (maybe it crashed?)
I think you might be experiencing this bug: https://bugs.launchpad.net/ubuntu/+source/vlc/+bug/290753
